title: Cereal killers recruiting
body: looking for 1 more player possibly we are at 10 wins 5 loses bronze 1 with 84 lp looking for any role really however are only able to invite on the 1 of September so keep in mind if you add me looking to join you might possibly have to wait. Only requirements is that you are a fairly active. you fit well with the team and you dont go 0-10 every game so with that i hope to see you on league.
